name: 尤正吉
objective: This course emphasizes the stead state, time, and frequency analysis of vehicle dynamics. Vehicle Models including plane and space motions will be detailed deduced. The application and development of these models to vehicle performance, handling and ride will be discussed. The effects of suspension, steering geometry, and tyre mechanics on handling are also covered.
schedule:
1.Introduction, Tyre Characteristics
2.Tyre Mechanics
3.Tyre Mechanics
4.Tyre Mechanics
5.Equations of Motion (Newtonian)
6.Vehicle Peformance
7.Four-Wheel Drive
8.Braking
9.Midterm
10.2 d.o.f. Steady-State Motion
11.2 d.o.f. Transient Motion
12.Equations of Motion (Lagrangian)
13.Steering System Dynamics
14.Four-Wheel Steering
15.3 d.o.f. Steady-State Motion
16.Ride Models
17.Ride Characteristics
18.Final
